ygData.subject: Research tactics
ygData.msgSnippet: ...  ... Couple of quick (I hope) questions. I was planning on putting all my training points at every level (post-20) into Research. Should I do this as
ygData.messageBody:
--- Sergey Bukhman <sergeyb@...> wrote:
> From: Sergey Bukhman <sergeyb@...>
>

<snip>

>
> A good idea about research is to put all points
> possible each level into
> it. Personally, I've made all possible spells, some
> twice, and I've only
> failed twice, maybe three times. Each time you try
> there is a chance
> your skill will go up too.
>
> --
> Sergey
> --
>
> KPS, PUNK (Paramilitary Undercover Nuclear Kamikaze)
>

Couple of quick (I hope) questions.

I was planning on putting all my training points at every level
(post-20) into Research. Should I do this as soon as I level, or wait
until just before I level (in case I get a couple of Runes to try which
aren't yet trivial during the level)?

I've heard there's a 5 point per level cap...if I happen to miss a
level, and not make it to a guild hall, can I put in 10 next level?

Can I top the 5 point cap by actually doing Research (since there's a
chance it goes up every time I try to combine runes), or is that a cap
based on my level, like most skills?

Well, okay, that was three instead of two. I think the sun in Oasis is
getting to me...

Thanks!
